member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonClaimValueTypes
member.summary: Constants for Json Web tokens.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonClaimValueTypes.Json
member.summary: A URI that represents the JSON XML data type.
member.remarks: When mapping json to .Net Claim(s), if the value was not a string (or an enumeration of strings), the ClaimValue will serialized using the current JSON serializer, a property will be added with the .Net type and the ClaimTypeValue will be set to 'JsonClaimValueType'.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonClaimValueTypes.JsonArray
member.summary: A URI that represents the JSON array XML data type.
member.remarks: When mapping json to .Net Claim(s), if the value was not a string (or an enumeration of strings), the ClaimValue will serialized using the current JSON serializer, a property will be added with the .Net type and the ClaimTypeValue will be set to 'JsonClaimValueType'.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonClaimValueTypes.JsonNull
member.summary: A URI that represents the JSON null data type
member.remarks: When mapping json to .Net Claim(s), we use empty string to represent the claim value and set the ClaimValueType to JsonNull

member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken
member.summary: A designed for representing a JSON Web Token (JWT).

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of from a string in JWS or JWE Compact serialized format.
member.param: A JSON Web Token that has been serialized in JWS or JWE Compact serialized format.
member.exception: 'jwtEncodedString' is not in JWS or JWE Compact serialization format.
member.remarks: The contents of the returned have not been validated, the JSON Web Token is simply decoded. Validation can be accomplished using the validation methods in

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class where the header contains the crypto algorithms applied to the encoded header and payload.
member.param: A string containing JSON which represents the cryptographic operations applied to the JWT and optionally any additional properties of the JWT.
A string containing JSON which represents the claims contained in the JWT. Each claim is a JSON object of the form { Name, Value }.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Actor
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'actort' claim { actort, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the 'actort' claim is not found, an empty string is returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Alg
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'alg' claim { alg, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the 'alg' claim is not found, an empty string is returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Audiences
member.summary: Gets the list of 'aud' claim { aud, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the 'aud' claim is not found, enumeration will be empty.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.AuthenticationTag
member.summary: Gets the AuthenticationTag from the original raw data of this instance when it was created.
member.remarks: The original JSON Compact serialized format passed into the constructor.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Ciphertext
member.summary: Gets the Ciphertext from the original raw data of this instance when it was created.
member.remarks: The original JSON Compact serialized format passed into the constructor.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Claims
member.summary: Gets a for each JSON { name, value }.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Cty
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'cty' claim { cty, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the 'cty' claim is not found, an empty string is returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Enc
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'enc' claim { enc, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the 'enc' value is not found, an empty string is returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.EncryptedKey
member.summary: Gets the EncryptedKey from the original raw data of this instance when it was created.
member.remarks: The original JSON Compact serialized format passed into the constructor.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Header
member.summary: Represents the cryptographic operations applied to the JWT and optionally any additional properties of the JWT.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Id
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'jti' claim { jti, ''value' }.
member.remarks: If the 'jti' claim is not found, an empty string is returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.InitializationVector
member.summary: Gets the InitializationVector from the original raw data of this instance when it was created.
member.remarks: The original JSON Compact serialized format passed into the constructor.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.InnerToken
member.summary: Gets the associated with this instance.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.IssuedAt
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'iat' claim { iat, 'value' } converted to a assuming 'value' is seconds since UnixEpoch (UTC 1970-01-01T0:0:0Z).
member.remarks: If the 'iat' claim is not found, then is returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Issuer
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'iss' claim { iss, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the 'iss' claim is not found, an empty string is returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Kid
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'kid' claim { kid, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the 'kid' claim is not found, an empty string is returned.

member.remarks: If the 'typ' claim is not found, an empty string is returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.ValidFrom
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'nbf' claim { nbf, 'value' } converted to a assuming 'value' is seconds since UnixEpoch (UTC 1970-01-01T0:0:0Z).
member.remarks: If the 'nbf' claim is not found, then is returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.ValidTo
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'exp' claim { exp, 'value' } converted to a assuming 'value' is seconds since UnixEpoch (UTC 1970-01-01T0:0:0Z).
member.remarks: If the 'exp' claim is not found, then is returned.

member.remarks: If the 'zip' claim is not found, an empty string is returned.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Decode(System.String[],System.String)
member.summary: Decodes the string into the header, payload and signature.
member.param: the tokenized string.
the original token.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.DecodeJwe(System.String[])
member.summary: Decodes the payload and signature from the JWE parts.
member.param: Parts of the JWE including the header.
member.remarks: Assumes Header has already been set.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.DecodeJws(System.String[])
member.summary: Decodes the payload and signature from the JWS parts.
member.param: Parts of the JWS including the header.
member.remarks: Assumes Header has already been set.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.GetPayloadValue``1(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the 'value' corresponding to the provided key from the JWT payload { key, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the key has no corresponding value, returns null.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.TryGetPayloadValue``1(System.String,``0@)
member.summary: Tries to get the 'value' corresponding to the provided key from the JWT payload { key, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the key has no corresponding value, returns false. Otherwise returns true.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.GetHeaderValue``1(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the 'value' corresponding to the provided key from the JWT header { key, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the key has no corresponding value, returns null.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.TryGetHeaderValue``1(System.String,``0@)
member.summary: Tries to get the value corresponding to the provided key from the JWT header { key, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the key has no corresponding value, returns false. Otherwise returns true.

member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebTokenHandler
member.summary: A designed for creating and validating Json Web Tokens. See: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7519 and http://www.rfc-editor.org/info/rfc7515.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebTokenHandler.TokenType
member.summary: Gets the type of the .

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebTokenHandler.CanReadToken(System.String)
member.summary:
Determines if the string is a well formed Json Web Token (JWT).
see: http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7519
member.param: String that should represent a valid JWT.

returns.para: 'false' if the token is null or whitespace.
'true' if the token is in JSON compact serialization format.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebTokenHandler.CanValidateToken
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates if this handler can validate a .
member.returns: 'true', indicating this instance can validate a .

member.summary: Creates a JWS (Json Web Signature).
member.param: A string containing JSON which represents the JWT token payload.
Defines the security key and algorithm that will be used to sign the JWS.
member.returns: A JWS in Compact Serialization Format.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebTokenHandler.CreateToken(Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor)
member.summary: Creates a JWS(Json Web Signature).
member.param: A that contains details of contents of the token.
member.returns: A JWS in Compact Serialization Format.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebTokenHandler.CreateToken(System.String,Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.SigningCredentials,Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptingCredentials)
member.summary: Creates a JWE (Json Web Encryption).
member.param: A string containing JSON which represents the JWT token payload.
Defines the security key and algorithm that will be used to sign the JWT.
Defines the security key and algorithm that will be used to encrypt the JWT.
member.returns: A JWE in compact serialization format.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebTokenHandler.CreateToken(System.String,Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.SigningCredentials,Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptingCredentials,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a JWE (Json Web Encryption).
member.param: A string containing JSON which represents the JWT token payload.
Defines the security key and algorithm that will be used to sign the JWT.
Defines the security key and algorithm that will be used to encrypt the JWT.
Defines the compression algorithm that will be used to compress the JWT token payload.
member.returns: A JWE in compact serialization format.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebTokenHandler.CompressToken(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Compress a JWT token string.
member.exception: if the compression algorithm is not supported.

member.summary: Decrypts a JWE and returns the clear text
member.param: the JWE that contains the cypher text.
contains crypto material.
member.returns: the decoded / cleartext contents of the JWE.

if the JWE was not able to be decrypted.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebTokenHandler.ReadJsonWebToken(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string into an instance of .
member.param: A 'JSON Web Token' (JWT) in JWS or JWE Compact Serialization Format.
member.remarks: If the 'token' is in JWE Compact Serialization format, only the protected header will be deserialized. This method is unable to decrypt the payload. Use to obtain the payload.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenUtilities.GetDateTime(System.String,Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject)
member.summary: Gets the DateTime using the number of seconds from 1970-01-01T0:0:0Z (UTC)
member.param: Claim in the payload that should map to an integer, float, or string.
The payload that contains the desired claim value.
member.remarks: If the claim is not found, the function returns: DateTime.MinValue
member.exception: If the value of the claim cannot be parsed into a long.
member.returns: The DateTime representation of a claim.
